title: The Busy harbour
brief_description: Ted and Maria visit a tugboat captain in the busy harbour. He explains some of the many activities going on in the harbour; fishing boats unloading, tugboats pulling barges, cargo ships, a lighthouse and buoy. They take a ride on the captain’s tugboat.
